description: The cause identified is related to issues with newer optional releases from Microsoft that may contain patches addressing specific system vulnerabilities or bugs. In this case, the specific flaw or challenge being resolved is documented in KB-5045594. This fix likely pertains to a malfunction or errant behavior in specific Microsoft software that requires attention from system administrators. The mention of the MS page indicates that Microsoft has acknowledged and provides solutions for existing issues impacting system performance. As systems administrators implement these updates, it is crucial to monitor system stability following the application of the fixes included in such releases.
